In general, a numerical approach is necessary to compute the integral in Eq.~\ref{eq:off-axis-spectrum}. For this paper, in most cases a IV order Runge-Kutta method has been used to compute separately the specific flux light curve at a number of frequencies. The values of the specific fluxes at a certain time then constitute the spectrum at that time.
